review.reviewBody: I would give 5 stars but they downsized their takeout containers and portions so the value is no longer there.  Prices also increased :(
Brings me straight to the streets of Hong Kong. Good food and huge portion
ï¿¼ï¿¼Curry beef brisket is a no contest winner....definitely an award winner!
